summary: BRAKE FAILURE.  AFTER SLOWING OR STOPPING AT AN INTERSECTION OR PULLING INTO A PARKING SPOT, AND AFTER RELEASING THE BRAKES, AT REAPPLICATION THE BRAKE DOES NOT RESPOND.  THE PEDAL DOES NOT RESPOND, NO DEPRESSION TAKES PLACE -- IT FEELS LIKE A ROCK! -- AND THE TRUCK DOES NOT STOP.  AFTER REPEATED ATTEMPTS, THE BRAKE WILL EVENTUALLY RESPOND, IN THE MEANTIME IT IS A HAZARDOUS SITUATION.
